disclaimer.title: Framework Development Status
text: This is a proof-of-concept project exploring new approaches to global governance. As such, these frameworks are living documents and vary in maturity.
Our goal is to inspire discussion and provide adaptable tools, not to present a finalized, operational system.
• Meant to support, not replace, human judgment and policy expertise.
• We welcome feedback to shape their evolution. Check each document’s status for its current readiness level.

whyExists.title: Why This Exists
whyExists.paragraph1: This project began with a fundamental question: What would it take for humanity to thrive together?
whyExists.paragraph2: We are driven by a lifelong fascination with the Earth as a shared home and the need for ethical systems that serve all life. Global Governance Frameworks is our response; a living proposal for what a more interconnected, inclusive, and future-ready form of governance could look like.
whyExists.paragraph3b: is our flagship framework, and the success of all other frameworks hinges upon it. This work is offered openly, shaped by conversations with AI systems like Claude and Gemini, and grounded in the belief that good governance must emerge from shared wisdom.
whyExists.paragraph4: The challenges we face are urgent. You are invited to explore, question, and help us build the future we need.

languageStatement.title: Language and Inclusivity
languageStatement.paragraph1: True global governance must speak every language. For the frameworks to be truly universal, they must be accessible to all. We are deeply committed to making the
languageStatement.paragraph1b: and all related materials and frameworks available in as many languages as possible.
languageStatement.paragraph2: Currently, the core documents are actively maintained in English, as a global language of diplomacy, and Swedish, the mother tongue of the initial researcher. We recognize this is only a starting point.
languageStatement.paragraph3: We believe the vital work of translation belongs to the community. It is a powerful way to ensure the framework's concepts are adapted accurately and resonate within different cultures. If you are a native speaker and believe in this work, we warmly invite you to help bring these ideas to your community.

title: Global Governance Frameworks
subtitle: Connecting governance innovations across the world

intro.heading: Frameworks for a new era of governance
intro.text: Developing interoperable systems and operating models for global governance that respect local autonomy while enabling effective coordination.

treatyFeature.heading: The Foundational Framework: Treaty for Our Only Home
treatyFeature.lead: Our comprehensive, ready-to-implement response to the global polycrisis. This Tier 0 framework is the essential operating system upgrade for 21st-century global governance.
treatyFeature.point1: Reforms core institutions like the UN Security Council.
treatyFeature.point2: Strengthens international law with concepts like Ecocide.
treatyFeature.point3: Establishes sustainable funding for global public goods.

performanceTeaser.heading: Our Commitment to Transparency
performanceTeaser.text: Each framework is continuously evaluated against its own core principles. We believe in transparently tracking our progress and holding this work accountable to its stated ethical goals.

emergingPossibilities.heading: Emerging Global Possibilities
emergingPossibilities.intro: We're witnessing promising developments that create new pathways for effective global governance:

possibilities.title: Global Digital Commons
possibilities.description: Digital technologies are enabling unprecedented coordination across borders. Citizens worldwide now connect, organize, and develop solutions in real-time, creating informal governance networks that often work faster than formal institutions.

possibilities.title: Successful Transnational Frameworks
possibilities.description: Initiatives like the Paris Climate Accord show that nations can align on critical planetary challenges. These frameworks demonstrate that with sufficient shared interest, global cooperation is not only possible but increasingly necessary.

possibilities.title: Bottom-Up Governance Innovations
possibilities.description: Communities worldwide are experimenting with participatory democracy, digital decision-making, and collaborative resource management—creating working models that could scale to broader levels.

possibilities.title: Crisis-Driven Collaboration
possibilities.description: Shared challenges like climate change, pandemics, and AI risks are creating both the necessity and opportunity for deeper global cooperation, accelerating governance innovation to address common threats.

additionalInfo.heading: Why We Need Meta-Governance
additionalInfo.paragraph1: The world has numerous governance experiments happening at different scales, but they often operate in isolation. We need frameworks that allow these innovations to connect, share lessons, and evolve together.
additionalInfo.paragraph2: Global Governance Frameworks provides tools and patterns for:
listItems: Enabling governance to evolve to higher levels of consciousness
Supporting both direct democracy and international cooperation
additionalInfo.paragraph3: Our approach draws on systems thinking, Spiral Dynamics, and practical experience to create governance systems that are both efficient and deeply considerate of human values.

callToAction.heading: Join Us in Building Better Governance
callToAction.text: Whether you're a governance innovator, policy maker, or curious citizen, your perspective matters.

globalCitizenship.title: Discover Your Global Citizenship Path
globalCitizenship.lead: An interactive journey to connect your personal values with planetary action.
globalCitizenship.description: Our new Global Citizenship experience is a personalized gateway to understanding your place in the world. Take a short quiz to find your starting point, explore how your values connect to global systems on the interactive compass, and discover the governance frameworks that matter most to you.
globalCitizenship.point1: A 3-question quiz to personalize your journey.
globalCitizenship.point2: An interactive compass to visualize your path.
globalCitizenship.point3: Direct connections to the frameworks you care about.
